parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle can move unexpectedly, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle drives forward when in reverse
sudden acceleration or braking without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of airbags to deploy in a crash can lead to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Airbags did not deploy in a crash
despite the severity of the impact.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty driveshaft can cause a loss of drive power, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Loss of drive power
vehicle stalls or hesitates.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning infotainment system can cause distractions while driving, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Apple CarPlay system randomly disconnects
requiring the driver to restart apps
causing distractions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning oil level sensor can cause the driver to be unaware of actual oil levels, leading to engine damage or failure.
symptoms: Rapidly dropping engine oil levels displayed on the dashboard
despite no actual oil leak.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected braking can cause accidents or injuries, especially if other vehicles are following closely.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly brakes without warning
despite no obstacles or hazards.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The interruption of charging can cause inconvenience and potentially leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle interrupts charging on a Level 2 charger
causing overheating of the onboard charging port.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden breakage of the sunroof glass can cause injuries or distractions while driving.
symptoms: The sunroof glass breaks without warning
despite no external impact.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden stalling of the vehicle can cause accidents or injuries, especially if it occurs at high speeds.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly stalls
requiring the driver to restart the engine
causing a loss of power and control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The reflection of the dashboard texture on the windshield can cause distractions while driving, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The dashboard texture reflects on the windshield
making it difficult to see
especially in direct sunlight.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electric vehicle charging system can cause the vehicle to stop charging, leading to inconvenience, reduced range, and potential safety risks.
symptoms: The vehicle displays a "Charge Interrupted" message
the charging connector or internal charging unit overheats
the charging rate is reduced
and the vehicle takes longer to charge.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the hybrid system can cause the vehicle to lose power, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly loses power
the "HYBRID SYSTEM FAILURE" warning is displayed
and the vehicle is unable to move or turn off.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loss of motive power can cause the vehicle to lose speed, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly loses significant motive power
the vehicle is unable to accelerate above a certain speed
and multiple warning lights are illuminated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the touchscreen control panel can cause the vehicle's systems to malfunction, leading to inconvenience, distraction, and potential safety risks.
symptoms: The touchscreen buttons illuminate randomly
the AC and heat turn on randomly
the control panel beeps randomly
and the screen is cracked and unresponsive.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of advanced safety features can cause the vehicle to fail to stop or react in time, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: The adaptive cruise control fails to maintain a safe distance
the smart stop and go cruise control fails to stop the vehicle in time
and the vehicle fails to emergency brake in critical situations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the airbag system can cause unnecessary deployment, failure to deploy, or deployment with excessive force, leading to injuries, concussions, and even skin lacerations. This can also lead to accidents due to the distraction or loss of control caused by the unexpected airbag deployment.
symptoms: Airbags deploy unnecessarily
airbags fail to deploy in a crash
airbags deploy with excessive force
injuries or concussions sustained from airbag deployment
skin lacerations or flesh wounds from airbag deployment.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of Kia to apply the recall software update to affected vehicles can lead to airbag system malfunctions, putting drivers and passengers at risk of injury or accident.
symptoms: Dashboard screen turns off
loss of access to speed
gas
and other controls
airbag system malfunction
unnecessary airbag deployment
failure to deploy airbags in a crash.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The friction between the shoe and brake pedal can cause delayed foot movement, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: Difficulty switching from acceleration pedal to brake pedal
restricted foot movement
delayed reaction time
accidents or near-misses due to pedal interference.
